meanings.definition: Producing light by the passage of an electric current through a material.
meanings.sent1: The electroluminescent display on the watch glowed brightly in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The electroluminescent stars on the ceiling lit up the room with a soft light.
meanings.sent3: The electroluminescent paint on the walls made the room look like a magical fairyland.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as electroluminescent as the neon sign outside the store.
meanings.sent5: The electroluminescent effect of the fireworks was mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: A material that emits light when an electric current is passed through it.
meanings.sent1: The electroluminescent used in the display panel made the screen bright and visible.
meanings.sent2: The electroluminescent in the emergency exit sign glowed brightly during the power outage.
meanings.sent3: The electroluminescent in the toy spaceship made it look like it was flying through space.
meanings.sent4: The electroluminescent in the car dashboard made it easy to read the gauges at night.
meanings.sent5: The electroluminescent in the nightlight provided a gentle glow in the dark room.
